statements.sql: select `categories`.*, (select count(*) from `books` inner join `book_categories` on `books`.`id` = `book_categories`.`book_id` where `categories`.`id` = `book_categories`.`category_id` and `books`.`deleted_at` is null) as `books_count` from `categories`
